mathugama santha meri maha widyalaya saha aananda shasthraliya jathika pasala athara 50 wani maha krikat tharagaya me masa 22-23 dinayan hidi mathugama mahajana kridanganayedi pawathwe.mewara tharaga waraye lakunu 800k saha kadulu 97k dawaganimin wishishta daskam dakwana kasun samira da alwis santha meri kandayame nayakathwaya darana athara upanayakaya lesa akila maddumage katayuthu karayi.rasmika sampath, niroshan madhusanka, dhanuka heshan, wasantha ramesh, kawishka wikramasinha, nipun maddumage, thushan chathuranga, rajindra priyadarshana, udara madhusanka, janith madhusanka kumara, thisaru priyalalitha, malan disanayaka sesu samajikayan wethi.aananda shasthralaye nayakaya lesa madhusanka sandaruwanda, upanayakaya lesa lahiru sankalpa athukoralada katayuthu karana athara kandayame samajikayan lesa tharaka madhuwantha, damith jayasinha, nadish malshan, kawindu shalitha, ke.umesh, kasun chamara, nadun kumara, nisan jayamal, dhanushka prasan, thusitha kumara, ee.mehomad, chamil yasintha, shakthi wikramanayaka, kalana sankalpa, shanusha dilshan ek wethi..
